product_name: Hugger Mugger Cotton Cinch Yoga Strap - 8'
long_description: With an 8 ft. length that works even for tall yogis, the Hugger Mugger Cotton Yoga Strap with durable plastic buckle will give you years of safe, secure support. Cotton webbing is exceptionally strong(TM)rated to 500 lbs. Cinch buckle is lightweight and secure.
short_description: With an 8 ft. length that works even for tall yogis, the Hugger Mugger Cotton Yoga Strap with durable plastic buckle will give you years of safe, secure support.
